title: Eye Witness. No. 81
creator_credit: Hector Lemieux, Alvin Goldman, Peter Jones and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Cinemagazine items as follows: New Life for Ghost Town Miners: Aided by the provincial government, jobless mine workers of Alberta move from Nordegg and other abandoned coal-mining areas to obtain new work elsewhere in Canada. School for Frogmen: Officers and men of the Royal Canadian Navy’s Operational Diving Unit at Halifax undergo rigorous training courses to equip them for sub-surface duties.
